title: Share of IT budgets spent on IT security FY2005-FY2016
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Fiscal Year, and Share of total IT budget in each Fiscal Year on the y axis.
The Share of total IT budget is highest at Fiscal Year FY2017 and lowest at Fiscal Year FY2006.
The difference of Share of total IT budget between the highest and lowest Fiscal Year is 3.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of total IT budget for 13 number of Fiscal Years.
Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget and FY2006 has the lowest Share of total IT budget.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Fiscal Year, and Share of total IT budget in each Fiscal Year on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
The Share of total IT budget is highest at Fiscal Year FY2017 and lowest at Fiscal Year FY2006.
The difference of Share of total IT budget between the highest and lowest Fiscal Year is 3.4.
The Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget, followed by FY2016, and FY2015. Down to the Fiscal Year FY2006 which is the lowest.
Fiscal Year FY2005, and FY2007 have a similar Share of total IT budget that is 7.5.
The Fiscal Year FY2017 tends to be 1.19 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Fiscal Years, we get total 115.6.
